name: Indie Game Sim
description: Become an indie game developer! Make your own games by hand and publish them on a fantasy market like Steam. Earn fans, receive brutal reviews, and battle your inner demons. Can you become the creator of your dreams?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/10 Processor: 3GHz Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card Storage: 200 MB available space
